long_description: Declare your love for climbing with nary a word. The women's organic cotton Insignia T-Shirt from blurr says it all with an image of Squamish, British Columbia's legendary Chief rock formation. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Stylized, postcard-themed image of the Chief on the front; scripted blurr logo on back of neck. Insignia T-Shirt from blurr features an active fit that skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
short_description: Declare your love for climbing with nary a word. The women's organic cotton Insignia T-Shirt from blurr says it all with an image of Squamish, British Columbia's legendary Chief rock formation.
